dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S1228 IS: To amend the Public Lands Corps Act of 1993 to modify the cost-sharing requirement for conservation projects carried out by a qualified youth or conservation corps, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Risch (for himself, Mr. Merkley, Mr. Crapo, and Ms. Cortez Masto) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Public Lands Corps Act of 1993 to modify the cost-sharing requirement for conservation projects carried out by a qualified youth or conservation corps, and for other purposes.

section.header: Cost-sharing requirements for conservation projects carried out by a qualified youth or conservation corps
section.text: Section 212(a)(1) of the Public Lands Corps Act of 1993 (16 U.S.C. 1729(a)(1)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in the first sentence, by striking 75 and inserting 90; and
in the second sentence, by striking 25 and inserting 10.
